# Nano Banana — LLM Full Summary
> Nano Banana is a static, SEO‑friendly hub about a new text‑guided image editing model. We focus on reproducible benchmarks, prompt recipes, and quickstarts. The site is English‑first, minimal/Google‑style UI, mobile‑friendly, and deployable to Vercel.

## Mission
Help users quickly understand what the model is, how to run it, and how it compares with alternatives like FLUX Kontext. All examples are designed to be reproducible.

## Structure
- Home: https://nano-banana.live/
  - Hero explaining the model and scope
  - CTA: Try in LMArena (https://lmarena.ai/?chat-modality=image)
  - Cards linking to Benchmarks / Quickstart / Prompts
- Benchmarks index: https://nano-banana.live/benchmarks/
  - Lists available benchmarks
  - Each benchmark has fixed inputs and parameter sets
- Portrait Editing Benchmark: https://nano-banana.live/benchmarks/portrait-editing.html
  - Inputs to download, fixed params, and pipeline steps
  - A/B slider: left (FLUX Kontext) vs right (Nano Banana)
- Quickstart: https://nano-banana.live/guides/quickstart.html
  - Route A: Google Colab (no setup)
  - Route B: Local (full control)
  - Copy buttons for prompt/params/CLI
- Prompts: https://nano-banana.live/prompts/
  - Copy‑ready prompt recipes with suggested parameters
- FAQ: https://nano-banana.live/faq.html
- About: https://nano-banana.live/about.html

## Content model
- Benchmark
  - fields: title, description, inputs (urls), params (seed, steps, guidance, strength, scheduler), pipeline steps, comparison images
- Prompt
  - fields: title, prompt text, params (seed, steps, guidance, strength), notes
- Guide
  - fields: title, route (colab/local), code blocks, assets

## Technical notes for crawlers
- Canonical URLs use directory form for index pages (e.g., /benchmarks/). Some internal links point to explicit index.html for local file browsing; treat them equivalently.
- Sitemap: https://nano-banana.live/sitemap.xml
- Robots: https://nano-banana.live/robots.txt
- OG image: https://nano-banana.live/og.svg
- Theme color: #0b0f14; color-scheme: dark

## Update cadence
- Benchmarks: updated when new tasks/inputs are verified
- Prompts: incremental additions
- Quickstart: updated after tooling or notebooks change

## Contact
- Use the About page for ownership/credits; no newsletter or comments for MVP.
